author: Adam Rogers, Megan Molteni
title: The Mathematics of Predicting the Course of the Coronavirus
description: Epidemiologists are using complex models to help policymakers get ahead of the Covid-19 pandemic. But the leap from equations to decisions is a long one.
content: So Brandenburgs team got to work. They had already begun ordering more masks, gloves, face shields, and ventilators. They had opened a drive-thru testing station. Now they moved to deploy a surge plan, canceling all elective surgeries and trying to clear out … [+4238 chars]
